text: Joselito Rodríguez (1907–1985) was a Mexican screenwriter and film director.Biltereyst & Gennari p.76 ==Selected filmography== ===Director=== * The Priest's Secret (1941) * When Children Sin (1952) * Black Skull (1960) ===Screenwriter=== * My General's Women (1951) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Daniel Biltereyst & Daniela Treveri Gennari. Moralizing Cinema: Film, Catholicism, and Power. title: Joselito Rodríguez
